instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-10958: What is 820-10958? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: 2020 MBA <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-10958</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>  Powers up to S0.  No image or BL
threads.message:
S0 state.  All rails are present.   
no sign of water damage.

CPU never sends BL enable.
Image never appears.

CPU warms up and current draw and thermal imaging are consistent with a working machine.  No data traffic "<SIGNAL>DP_INT_ML_C_N</SIGNAL>"

threads.title: 2020 MBA <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-10958</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>  Powers up to S0.  No image or BL
threads.message: Did you check USB activity and external video?
